name: My little freak
description:
My little freak

Short visual novel (about 15 minutes) where a mysterious girl tries a lot of different ways to talk to its love interest.

Project made to learn how to use Visual Novel Maker.

There is no option to save or any branching paths, just a straightforward yuri story.

Press the full-screen button at the bottom-right corner of the game screen for a better experience.
